HomePage.title: Welcome to Princy's Dev blog
HomePage.subtitle: Thoughts, stories and ideas.
HomePage.intro: Welcome to my blog! I'm a full-stack React/.NET developer at
HomePage.experience: with over 2 years of web development experience and 200+ features delivered in production.
HomePage.mentorship: In parallel with my work, I'm also a
HomePage.mentorDescription: â€” I help juniors and career changers become job-ready based on what I experience every day in the field.
HomePage.blogDescription: This blog is a space where I share what I find interesting: tech news, experience feedback, advice for developers, and everything that can help the community progress.
HomePage.selectCategory: Select a category in the sidebar to discover my articles.
HomePage.openMenu: Open the menu to discover my articles.

MyPosts.title: My Posts
MyPosts.subtitle: Manage your blog posts and drafts
MyPosts.getStarted: Get started by creating your first blog post

Admin.title: Admin Dashboard
Admin.subtitle: Manage author requests and approvals
Admin.allProcessed: All author requests have been processed
Admin.rejectDescription: Are you sure you want to reject this author request?

Auth.welcomeAuthor: Welcome! To create and publish blog posts, you'll need author access.
Auth.readerAccount: Your account is currently set as a reader. Request author access to start creating content.
Auth.authorBenefits: By requesting author access, you'll be able to:
Auth.adminReview: An administrator will review your request. You'll be notified once your account is approved.
Auth.pendingDescription: Your request for author access is being reviewed.
Auth.pendingMessage: Your author access request has been submitted and is awaiting administrator approval. This usually takes 1-2 business days.
Auth.adminWillReview: An administrator will review your profile
Auth.notification: You'll receive a notification once approved
Auth.startCreating: Once approved, you can immediately start creating posts
Auth.declinedDescription: Unfortunately, your author access request was not approved.
Auth.declinedMessage: Your request for author access has been declined by an administrator.
Auth.contactAdmin: Contact an administrator for more information
Auth.continueBrowsing: Continue browsing and reading blog posts
Auth.approvedDescription: Congratulations! Your author access has been approved.
Auth.approvedMessage: You now have full access to create and manage blog posts.

Search.title: Search Posts
Search.description: Search by title, tags, category, author, or content

Errors.postNotFoundDescription: The post you are looking for does not exist or you do not have permission to edit it.
Errors.createFailed: Failed to create post. Please try again.
Errors.updateFailed: Failed to update post. Please try again.

Success.postUnpublished: Post unpublished and moved to drafts

Confirmation.deletePostDescription: Are you sure you want to delete "{title}"? This action cannot be undone.
Confirmation.deletePostGeneric: Are you sure you want to delete this post? This action cannot be undone.

PostList.noPostsMatch: No posts match the selected tags.
PostList.noPostsInCategory: No posts in this category yet.
